text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int tc , i , j , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & tc ) ; while ( tc -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] += max ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
